question: Which is the most populous Muslim-majority country in the world?
explanation: Indonesia is the most populous Muslim-majority country in the world. The country with the single largest population of Muslims in Indonesia in Southeast Asia, which on its own hosts 13% of the world's Muslims. Indonesia is a country in Southeast Asia and Oceania, between the Indian and Pacific oceans. Indonesia is the world's largest island country and the 14th-largest country by land area, at 1,904,569 square kilometres. With more than 270 million people, Indonesia is the world's fourth-most populous country and the most populous Muslim-majority country.
